author: suresh
msg: HADOOP-6246. Add backward compatibility support to use deprecated decimal umask from old configuration. Contributed by Jakob Homan.

author: minfrin
msg: Add an RPM init.d script to start the htcacheclean daemon, controlled

author: damien
msg: Refactoring of endkey code in views and btrees. End key functionaility is now handled inside the btree code, simplfying calling code and making it trivial to add new collation options

author: rajith
msg: Organized the tests to cover both allow and deny mode for particular case
Added more tests cases to exchange , particularly to cover QPID-2098
Fixed errors in test cases for queue acl
